data.title: Cheap movie tickets
data.meta_description: RACV Members enjoy discounts on movie tickets and bundles at Village, Hoyts, IMAX, Palace Cinemas and more.
data.text:
Valid for redemption at participating Cinemas. Vouchers are valid for one admission only and is to be surrendered at the ticket box for a cinema ticket. Vouchers don’t guarantee a seat - seating is subject to availability. Not valid for Movie Marathons, group bookings, alternative content or special event screenings. Not valid at Village Rosebud, Sorrento, Warragul and Warrnambool. Valid at Coburg drive in. Savings apply for 2 occupants only. More than 2 occupants please purchase direct from Coburg. Vouchers cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion unless otherwise stated. Vouchers are not valid for 4DX screenings. Booking fees may apply. A surcharge applies to upgrade the cinema experience (Payable directly to cinema at time of booking). It is the responsibility of the holder to use the voucher before the displayed expiry date. Treat the Voucher as you would cash. Lost or damaged vouchers cannot be replaced. The expiry date displayed is not extendable and expired vouchers cannot be extended, replaced or exchanged. Vouchers are non-refundable and cannot be redeemed for cash. Vouchers cannot be transferred or sold without the prior written permission. Candy Bar vouchers cannot be exchanged for movie tickets. The cinema reserves the right to change any terms contained within these Terms & Conditions at any time.

~ Valid for redemption at participating Cinemas. Candy Bar vouchers cannot be exchanged for movie tickets. Items cannot be substituted, replaced or exchanged with any other item. Food and Beverage eVouchers are not available for online redemption and must be presented at the Cinema during your visit. Vouchers cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion unless otherwise stated. It is the responsibility of the holder to use the voucher before the displayed expiry date. Treat the Voucher as you would cash. Lost or damaged vouchers cannot be replaced. The expiry date displayed is not extendable and expired vouchers cannot be extended, replaced or exchanged. Vouchers are non-refundable and cannot be redeemed for cash. Vouchers cannot be transferred or sold without the prior written permission. The cinema reserves the right to change any terms contained within these Terms & Conditions at any time.

*Vouchers must be pre-purchased from RACV Retail Store or at racv.com.au/movietickets. Discount does not apply to postage or credit card fees for tickets purchased online. Exclusive to RACV Members and RACV membership number and/or card must be presented at time of purchase. Tickets valid at participating cinemas for traditional cinema sessions only, excluding Victorian Public Holidays and School Holidays. Not valid with any other ticket offer or promotion unless otherwise stated. Vouchers valid until the last calendar day of the month indicated on the voucher. Tickets cannot be refunded, exchanged or transferred. Tickets purchased from RACV are for personal use only and cannot be on-sold. Candy Bar voucher redeemable 24 hours after purchase for one regular or frozen drink and one regular popcorn and must be surrendered at the Candy Bar on use. Alternate food and beverage items may be substituted should the advertised options no longer be available. For more details visit an RACV Retail Store or refer to the terms and conditions printed on the voucher.

Restrictions apply including weekends, Saturday nights and public holidays.

HOYTS: Vouchers cannot be redeemed for LUX, Directors Suite, HOYTS IMAX® or group or special events. Before purchasing any vouchers please check with the cinema on the classification. HOYTS tickets are not valid after 2pm Saturday and Sunday or anytime on a public holiday. Vouchers are valid at all HOYTS cinema locations. Vouchers are not valid at HOYTS affiliated cinemas.

Village: Not valid for Gold Class, group bookings, movie marathons, special events or in conjunction with any other offer or promotion unless otherwise stated. Mailout vouchers are valid at all Village cinema locations. Digital vouchers are not valid at Bendigo, Rosebud, Sorrento, Warragul and Warrnambool cinemas.

Palace: Vouchers are valid at all Palace cinema locations.

**This voucher is valid for one movie session admission on a Monday only. Voucher can be redeemed online at villagecinemas.com.au or at the ticket box for movie sessions screening on a Monday at participating Village Cinemas locations*. Vouchers cannot be redeemed until 24 hours after purchase. Seating is subject to availability. Please redeem this voucher for a seat to your selected movie session. Not valid for Gold Class, group bookings, special events, movie marathons or in conjunction with any other offer or promotion unless otherwise stated. A surcharge applies for 3D, 4DX, Vmax, Vpremium, Vjunior and Dolby Atmos sessions. Online booking fees may apply. It is the responsibility of the holder to redeem vouchers for a movie session scheduled on or before they expire. Vouchers are not refundable, not transferable and cannot be sold or exchanged for cash or other gift products. Lost or expired vouchers will not be extended, replaced or exchanged for cash. *Refer to villagecinemas.com.au for applicable locations. Not valid public holidays. Valid for sessions screening on Mondays only.

*^Voucher can be redeemed online at eventcinemas.com.au,villagecinemas.com.au or at the ticket box for movie sessions screening prior to expiry at participating cinema locations*. Seating is subject to availability. Please redeem this voucher for a seat to your selected movie session. Not valid for 4DX, group bookings, special events, movie marathons or in conjunction with any other offer or promotion unless otherwise stated. A surcharge applies for 3D, Vmax, Vpremium, Vjunior and Dolby Atmos sessions. Booking fees may apply. It is the responsibility of the holder to redeem vouchers for a movie session scheduled on or before they expire. Vouchers are not refundable, not transferrable and cannot be sold or exchanged for cash or other gift products. Lost or expired vouchers will not be extended, replaced or exchanged for cash. Not valid at Rosebud, Sorrento, Warragul, Warrnambool, Moonlight Cinemas or Skyline Drive In. Refer to eventcinemas.com.au or villagecinemas.com.au for applicable locations.

^Moonlight eVouchers are valid for use for the 2023-24 Summer season only. Valid for 1x general admission to a standard movie session at Moonlight Cinema only. The onus is on the holder to use the eVoucher before the expiry date. eVouchers must be redeemed prior to the end of the 2023-24 Summer season. Refer to moonlight.com.au for final season dates for your location. Moonlight eVouchers do not guarantee a reserved seat - seating is subject to availability. Available for online bookings at moonlight.com.au, booking fees apply; or present at the box office. Moonlight eVouchers are not valid for use for Gold Grass, Gold Class, Premium Seating concepts, 4DX, Boutique, Event Junior, Movie Marathons, Chicks At The Flicks, group bookings or any sessions classified as festivals, alternate content or special events including but not limited to foreign films. No refunds given except those required by law. No date extensions available. No change given. Moonlight eVouchers cannot be transferred or sold without the prior written consent of The Greater Union Organisation Pty Limited. Standard classifications apply. Valid for use in Australia only. If a movie session is cancelled or terminated by Moonlight Management due to adverse weather conditions or technical considerations, a voucher redeemable for the same ticket type for a future session in the current season will be provided. In the event that a session is cancelled or terminated by Moonlight Management, ticket holders will be notified via SMS and announcements will be made online and through social media. Entry may be refused if eVouchers are damaged or defaced in any way or are not purchased through one of Moonlight's authorised points of sale. Conditions of entry apply. Please refer to moonlight.com.au for details, or for any Moonlight Cinema enquiries. We reserve the right to change any terms contained in these Terms and Conditions at any time.

^^Gold Grass eVouchers are valid for use for the 2023-24 Summer season only. Valid for 1x Gold Grass admission to a standard movie session at Moonlight Gold Grass only. The onus is on the holder to use the Gold Grass eVoucher on or before the specified expiry date. Gold Grass eVouchers must be redeemed prior to the end of the 2023-24 Summer season. Refer to moonlight.com.au for final season dates for your location. Not valid for use in ACT. This Gold Grass eVoucher cannot be redeemed for Gold Class, Premium Seating concepts, 4DX, Boutique, Event Junior, Movie Marathons, Chicks At The Flicks, group bookings or any sessions classified as festivals, alternate content or special events including but not limited to foreign films. Gold Grass eVouchers do not guarantee a reserved seat - seating is subject to availability. Gold Grass eVouchers will not be extended, replaced or exchanged and are invalid without an expiry date. Do not share or disclose the barcode or PIN details to ensure your Gold Grass eVoucher remains secure. Once the barcode has been used it becomes void. Barcodes cannot be used more than once. No refunds, other than those required by law, will be given after the date of purchase. No change given. Your Gold Grass eVoucher status (including expiry date) can be viewed online: eventcinemas.com.au/giftcard/balance. If a movie session is cancelled or terminated by Moonlight Management due to adverse weather conditions or technical considerations, a voucher redeemable for the same ticket type for a future session in the current season will be provided. In the event that a session is cancelled or terminated by Moonlight Management, ticket holders will be notified via SMS and announcements will be made online and through social media. Entry may be refused if tickets are damaged or defaced in any way or are not purchased through one of Moonlight's authorised points of sale. Conditions of entry apply. Please refer to moonlight.com.au for details, or any other Moonlight Cinemas enquiries. GUO reserve the right to change any terms contained in these Terms and Conditions at any time.
